message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG 

The paper deals with the task of automatic emotion recognition (AER) using audio and visual information. This task involves multiple areas of computer science, including multimedia (cs.MM), computer vision (cs.CV), speech and audio processing (cs.SD), natural language processing (cs.CL), and machine learning (cs.LG). However, since the paper focuses on the fusion of audio and visual features using deep learning techniques, cs.MM and cs.CV are the most likely sub-categories. The attention mechanism used in the paper also suggests a possible connection to cs.CL. Finally, the use of neural networks for feature integration and classification indicates a connection to cs.LG.
